title: Please READ HELP
body: I Would Like to get a PBE Testing account but i do not know how to aquire one that you and if you can i would like help

replies.body: Hey Fordeh, PBE is currently down for maintenance so it's not possible to sign up or create a PBE account.  Our devs will be posting updates on the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).  Hang tight until that's done and we get more info.
